title: TIE Vampire Mk1
wikitext:
[[File:TIE-Vampire-Mk1.jpg|thumb|500px]] '''TIE Vampire Mk1'''
'''Craft''': Sienar Fleet Systems/ShiCon Dynamics Tie Vampire Mk1 Starfighter
'''Scale''': Starfighter
'''Length''': 7.1 meters
'''Skill''': Starfighter Piloting - TIE
'''Crew''': 1
'''Crew Skills''': Piloting 6D, Starship gunnery 5D+2
'''Consumables''': 1 Day
'''Cargo Capacity''': 55kg
'''Space''': 11
'''Atmosphere''': 435-1.200 km/h
'''Maneuverablity''': 3D+1
'''Hull''': 3D
'''Shields''': 1D
'''Sensors''': *Passive: 25/D *Scan: 45/2D *Search: 65/3D *Focus: 4/3D+2 '''Weapons''': *4 Laser Cannons ( Fire linked ) : Fire Arc: Front
Fire Control: 2D
Range: Space: 1-3/12/25
Range Atmosphere: 100-300/1,2/2,5km
Damage: 6D *1 Concussion Missle Launcer ( 10 Missle magazine ) : Fire Arc: Front
Fire Control: 3D
Range: Space: 1/3/7
Range Atmosphere: 50-100/300/700
Damage:7D =====Capsule===== The Vampire is the first ship that was built in collaboration between Sienar and ShiCon Dynamics.
The Mk1 is produced in small numbers and later repalced with the Mk2.
